name: Mindscape
0:
”Alexa, ask Mindscape for a breathing exercise”
”Alexa, ask Mindscape for a soundscape”
”Alexa, tell Mindscape I want to talk about how I feel”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mind scape
des:
Mindscape is here to help you feel better when you’re feeling anxious, stressed or experiencing a panic attack, through breathing exercises, talking together about how you're feeling, and by listening to specially-created, therapeutic soundscapes.

HOW DOES IT WORK?
Through a guided analysis, speak about what is making you feel anxious, learn to moderate your thoughts and breathing, and regain control with expert tips and by listening to scientifically-developed soundscapes.

As you talk over how you’re feeling, Mindscape will offer up helpful tips and information on how to manage what’s making you feel worried, all created in collaboration with mental health charity Mind, in Haringey.

Whether you’re anxious about work, getting to sleep, student life, or many of the other worries we can all experience from time to time, Mindscape is completely free to use and available to speak to 24/7. 

To begin the experience, just say: Alexa, open Mindscape. 

You can also jump straight to one of the main features of Mindscape:

Alexa, ask Mindscape for a breathing exercise
Alexa, ask Mindscape for a soundscape
Alexa, tell Mindscape I want to talk about how I feel

-

Note, Mindscape is intended as a support for instances when you are unable or unwilling to access medical support, and not a replacement for psychological treatment.

-

If you have questions, comments, or feedback, please email support@cultmindscape.com. We’d also love to hear from you if there is a feature you would like added, or any other way you feel we could make Mindscape even better.

Mindscape is intended as a support for instances when you are unable or unwilling to access medical support, and not a replacement for psychological treatment. This skill does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
